name: Forest Folk (xKayo)
description:
Welcome to Forest Folk

In this short little walking simulator you play as Matsu, a little fox. Help the other villagers to prepare everything for their annual summernight festival and enjoy the calming atmosphere as you stroll through the woods.

Controls

Move: WASD or Left Stick

Interact: E or South/East button

Pause: ESC or Start

How to install

Forest Folk is designed for Windows PC.

1. Download ZIP file     
2. Right click and extract the file 
3. Save the file in a nice and cozy place
4. Start the .exe   
5. Enjoy!
